bioghist.head: Biographical note
bioghist.p: Gaetano Perretto (1895-1971) was a first generation Italian-American who lived in the Williamsburg neighborhood of Brooklyn. giglio model also donated Born in Nola, Italy and came to the US in 1921. He was involved in the Giglio festival and made gigli in his apartment.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Two color photographs, circa 1960s, showing Gaetano Perretto pictured with Giglios he constructed.
